title: !!!!!!I QUIT!!!!!!
body:
i cant play league anymore
to many people who only play for them selfs 
and then rages at you cause they havent been playing as a team 

to much salt and trolls im never playing stupid game ever again

you guys have done nothing when it comes to people who troll and is salty and instalocks, you if guys care about your game you would do something about this but no yous are useless
i wonder if riot is just a bunch of people who likes to troll people, sure feels like it

replies.body: lol see you back in a week OP
The entitlement mentality is strong  in this one
ew no dont go play overwatch, i dont want your toxic ass there please

Complains about too much Salt. Invokes salt into OP.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

But seriously, it's a game mate. Mute the trolls, or troll back. Haters gonna hate, Trolls gunna Troll, Salters gunna complain you used too much pepper but lets be honest no one likes pepper anyway.
If you can learn to play other champs and other roles, Instalocking should make zero difference to how much fun you can have in the game.
